TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void DetailsAcquiredHandler(object o, DetailsAcquiredArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed DetailsAcquiredHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the DetailsAcquiredHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the DetailsAcquiredHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the DetailsAcquiredHandler is removed from the event.
